document_data.name: Tankardstall Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''Tankardstall Hall''' was a small manor in the town of [[Purskul]] in [[Amn]].
document_data.Location: Tankardstall Hall stood conveniently on the [[Orc Road]] that stretched north from [[Purskul]], making it a main stop along the route.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1270}}, the Tankardstall Hall belonged to the [[Hamlar]] family of Amn. By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the manor was purchased by the [[Talltankard (clan)|Talltankard]] [[hin]] family of [[wine]] merchants. The master of the manor was [[Cumber Talltankard]] ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1370}}. Under his control, the manor hosted annual lavish celebrations of the first batches of the Talltankard seasonal wines to be sold north.
